summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Third Avenue South, from Yesler Way to Jackson Street, in the City of Seattle, by the installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb on each side of said avenue, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system, in accordance with Resolution No. 2054 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
